subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Either from [[鵝]] with nominalizing suffix *'''-n'''; or both {{och-l|鵝}} and {{och-l|雁}} reflect an earlier liquid final *'''-l''' or *'''-r''' ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). 

From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ŋa-n||goose}}, cognate with {{cog|bo|ངང་པ}}, {{cog|my|ငန်း}}.

On resonants' correspondence among Burmese, Tibetan and Chinese, see {{zh-ref|Hill (2014)}}.
